additionalinformation: Son of Joseph Alphonse and Eva Gauthier, of Montreal, Province of Quebec.

forename: The Rev. JOSEPH ALPHONSE PAUL EUGENE
additionalinformation: Son of Dr. Eugene Gauthier and Berthe Gauthier, of Rock Island, Province of Quebec.
Son of Philias and Stella Gauthier, of Ottawa, Ontario.
Son of George L. Gauthier and Mary Gauthier, of Belleville.
Son of Rodrigue and Albertine Gauthier, of Montreal; husband of Simone Gauthier, of Montreal.
Son of Edley Joseph and Annie Catherine Gauthier, of Vancouver.
Son of Thomas and Domithilda Gauthier, of Grand Forks.
Son of Ambroise Gauthier, of 36, St. James St., Fall River, Massachusetts, U.S.A.
